sentence: Lifetime Subscriber to CNN+ (@MartiniShark) May 3, 2022 Presentation Paraadox THE DAILY SHOW If you think he was mad at the jokes, imagine if he had said something about them oh, waityou already imagined it One of the preferred targets of Trevor Noah during the White House Correspondents Dinner was Florida Governor Ron DeSantis.
author: Brad Slager
title: Nothing Like a SCOTUS Leak to Bring Out the Deranged Media
